name: Tumu Dog
description:
This is easy physics 3 match puzzle game!
You collect and connect lovely dogs and erase dogs.
Let's try erasing many dogs in 60 seconds!

[Rule]
- If three or more dogs are connected, you erase a dog and can acquire a score.
- You can gain a high score more, if a dog is connected for a long time.
- You can get "BIG dog", if 5 dogs can be connected.
- "BIG dog" has a score 4 times.
- You can get a "dog BALL", if 7 dogs can be connected further.
- A "dog BALL" is a special ball which disappears only by one.
- If you do the tap of the "dog BALL", the same kind of dog disappears at a stretch, and you can gain a high score further.
